scenes.narration: WHY is the deeper benefit — what that result enables. 'So they can take a vacation without their phone blowing up.' That's what they really want.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man entrepreneur points to a visual representation of a tropical beach vacation projected on a large screen in the communications center. The scene shows a person relaxing in a hammock, undisturbed, while a phone is buried in the sand, implying freedom and escape from work.
scenes.templateHTML: WHY - The Deeper Benefit

scenes.heading: The Complete Online Hook
scenes.narration: Put it together: 'I help overwhelmed service business owners systematize their operations so they can take a vacation without their phone blowing up.'
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur stands at the central console, proudly presenting a complete online hook on the main screen: “I help overwhelmed service business owners systematize their operations so they can take a vacation without their phone blowing up.” The team behind her gives a thumbs-up.
scenes.templateHTML: The Complete Online Hook

scenes.heading: Face-to-Face Hooks
scenes.narration: Networking events and conversations need a different approach. Instead of starting with yourself, start with a problem they'll recognize.
scenes.visualDescription: A Middle Eastern man entrepreneur grimaces while holding a name tag at a virtual networking event displayed on a large screen. Speech bubbles above the attendees heads show generic introductions like "What do you do?". He covers his face in mock embarrassment.
scenes.templateHTML: Face-to-Face Hooks

scenes.heading: The Problem-Solution Formula
scenes.narration: Use this formula: 'You know how' — state the problem — 'I help with that by' — your solution. This creates instant recognition and curiosity.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic woman entrepreneur gestures to a diagram on a screen depicting the "Problem-Solution" formula. The "Problem" side shows a frustrated client surrounded by broken links and error messages, while the "Solution" side shows a customer easily finding her business.
scenes.templateHTML: The Problem-Solution Formula

scenes.heading: Face-to-Face Example
scenes.narration: 'You know how small businesses struggle to get found online even though they're great at what they do? I help them build search visibility so customers find them first.'
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian man entrepreneur is displayed as a hologram, delivering his problem-solution hook: "You know how small businesses struggle to get found online even though they're great at what they do? I help them build search visibility so customers find them first." Several holographic listeners nod in agreement.
scenes.templateHTML: Face-to-Face Example

scenes.heading: Why This Works
scenes.narration: It works because you're talking about their world, not yours. It creates recognition — they nod because they've seen this problem. And it invites curiosity.
scenes.visualDescription: A White woman entrepreneur smiles knowingly as she observes several holographic figures in the communications station nodding in agreement to a speaker's presentation. A thought bubble above one hologram says, "That's exactly my problem!"
scenes.templateHTML: Why This Works

scenes.heading: Common Hook Mistakes
scenes.narration: Let's look at the mistakes that kill conversions. These are the traps that make your hook fall flat.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur stands in front of a screen with a large "X" symbol displayed prominently. Underneath, a list of "Common Hook Mistakes" appears in red lettering. The atmosphere feels tense and foreboding.
scenes.templateHTML: Common Hook Mistakes

scenes.heading: Mistake #1: The Feature Dump
scenes.narration: The feature dump is talking about what you do, not what they get. Don't list features — describe the outcome. What changes in their life?
scenes.visualDescription: An East Asian woman entrepreneur stares in disbelief at a projected list of product features – "AI-powered, blockchain-enabled, data-driven." She shakes her head as she visualizes a confused customer struggling to understand the jargon.
scenes.templateHTML: Mistake #1: The Feature Dump

scenes.heading: Mistake #2: The Jargon Wall
scenes.narration: The jargon wall uses industry terms they don't understand. If they need a dictionary to decode your hook, you've lost them. Speak their language.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man entrepreneur looks frustrated as he's bombarded by industry jargon projected on the walls of the communications station. Words like "synergy," "paradigm shift," and "disruptive innovation" swirl around him, making him dizzy.
scenes.templateHTML: Mistake #2: The Jargon Wall

scenes.heading: Mistake #3: The Everyone Trap
scenes.narration: The everyone trap is trying to appeal to anyone and everyone. 'I help businesses grow' means nothing. Specificity attracts ideal customers AND repels poor fits.
scenes.visualDescription: A Middle Eastern woman entrepreneur wipes sweat from her brow as she reviews a generic, broad statement: "I help businesses grow." A visualization shows a single, diluted drop of liquid trying to fill a vast, empty container, emphasizing the ineffectiveness of a non-specific hook.
scenes.templateHTML: Mistake #3: The Everyone Trap

scenes.heading: Testing Your Hooks
scenes.narration: You won't get it right the first time. The best hooks are discovered through testing. Write five to ten variations and see what resonates.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man entrepreneur sits at a terminal in the communications station, surrounded by multiple screens displaying different versions of his hook. He types furiously, iterating and refining based on initial performance data.
scenes.templateHTML: Testing Your Hooks

scenes.heading: Watch for Success Signals
scenes.narration: Test at networking events and A/B test online. Watch for the head nod — great hooks make people physically nod. Listen for 'tell me more.' That's the signal you've got it.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur observes two monitors in the communications station. One screen displays a virtual networking event where attendees are nodding enthusiastically to a speaker; the other displays A/B testing data, showing a clear winner with a high click-through rate.
scenes.templateHTML: Watch for Success Signals

scenes.heading: Clarity Converts
scenes.narration: Remember: your hook isn't about being clever. It's about being clear. Clarity converts. Cleverness confuses. Make the right person think 'that's me' — and you've won.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur points emphatically at the words "Clarity Converts" displayed prominently on the main screen of the communications station. Holographic representations of diverse customers nod in agreement, understanding dawning on their faces. The scene exudes a feeling of triumph.
scenes.templateHTML: Clarity Converts

scenes.heading: Sales Is Process, Not Magic
scenes.narration: The entrepreneurs who consistently close deals have a system. They follow up when others forget.
scenes.visualDescription: A Middle Eastern woman entrepreneur wearing a headset stands confidently in front of a bank of monitors displaying sales data, gesturing towards a pipeline visualization with a teal marker. Radio towers glow with sunset orange light in the background. She's leading a training session, with holographic projections of sales strategies swirling around her. A subtle teal path extends from her feet towards the sales pipeline on the main monitor.
scenes.templateHTML: Sales Is Process, Not Magic

scenes.heading: They Track Everything
scenes.narration: They track where each prospect is and what they need next.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man entrepreneur meticulously updates a digital CRM on a large touchscreen built into the Communications Station's central console. Teal data streams highlight his focus on tracking leads. Multiple radio antennas in the background rotate to lock signals. He’s dressed in practical field gear, indicating he’s just back from meeting with potential clients.
scenes.templateHTML: They Track Everything

scenes.heading: Build Your System
scenes.narration: This is about building that system. Not complicated, just consistent.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur sits at a mission control console, de Behind her, technicians adjust satellite dish alignment. The scene emphasizes the systematic approach with teal lines connecting email touchpoints.
scenes.templateHTML: Build Your System

scenes.heading: The Shocking Truth
scenes.narration: 48% of salespeople never follow up after the first contact.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur slumps in a chair at the Communications Station, head in hands. A discarded sales proposal lies on the console in front of him. Red warning lights blink softly in the background. Holographic statistics show a near 50% failure rate looming over him, emphasizing the shock of initial contact abandonment.
scenes.templateHTML: The Shocking Truth

scenes.heading: Only 10% Persist
scenes.narration: Only 10% make more than 3 contacts with a prospect.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur stares intently at a heat map of prospect engagement displayed on a large screen, highlighting the minority of leads who persist. She’s surrounded by complex networking equipment, with teal cables snaking across the floor. She adjusts dials, trying to amplify faint signals from potential clients.
scenes.templateHTML: Only 10% Persist

scenes.heading: 80% After 5th Touch
scenes.narration: But 80% of sales happen after the 5th contact.
scenes.visualDescription: A White woman entrepreneur stands triumphantly before a large screen displaying a celebratory sales chart; 80% of sales happen after the 5th touch is prominently highlighted in teal. Confetti rains down digitally on the screen. Radio waves emanate from nearby antennas, broadcasting the success to the team.
scenes.templateHTML: 80% After 5th Touch

scenes.heading: Beat 90% of Competition
scenes.narration: Simply following up consistently beats 90% of competition.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur leans back in his chair, a satisfied grin on his face. His screen shows a comparison chart highlighting his consistent follow-up approach beating the competition, and the number 90% is emphasized with teal glow. He sips tea with a self-assured expression. He demonstrates how simplicity creates outstanding results.
scenes.templateHTML: Beat 90% of Competition

scenes.heading: Trust Accumulation Model
scenes.narration: Each touch builds trust incrementally. The first contact is cold.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic woman entrepreneur examines a projected graph illustrating the trust accumulation model. Each touchpoint is represented by a small structure being built upon the mountain, gradually ascending. The cold first contact is shown as a single brick at the bottom, isolated from all others.
scenes.templateHTML: Trust Accumulation Model

scenes.heading: Touches 1-2: Awareness
scenes.narration: Touches 1-2 introduce and provide value. No ask. Just give.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian man entrepreneur records a brief video message on his phone, intended as the first touch for a new lead. A teleprompter scrolls behind the camera displaying points for delivering value. He smiles warmly, offering helpful advice with no expectation of immediate return. Radio towers broadcast messages behind him.
scenes.templateHTML: Touches 1-2: Awareness

scenes.heading: Touches 3-4: Interest
scenes.narration: Touches 3-4 share relevant insights and case studies.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man entrepreneur presents a case study on a holographic projector, showcasing successful client outcomes. He gestures towards the projector, emphasizing the relevant insights for the potential client. Around the room, team members are reviewing similar case studies on their own screens.
scenes.templateHTML: Touches 3-4: Interest

scenes.heading: Touches 5-7: Decision
scenes.narration: Touches 5-7 move toward decision with proposals and closing.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur extends a hand to shake on a deal over a holographic proposal displayed on a central console. Another entrepreneur smiles and reciprocates the shake. Teal lasers highlight the acceptance terms on the document. The atmosphere is celebratory as the decision stage concludes.
scenes.templateHTML: Touches 5-7: Decision

scenes.heading: Your Sales Pipeline
scenes.narration: Define clear stages so you always know what to do next.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur draws on a whiteboard, mapping out the sales pipeline stages with teal markers. He diagrams a visual representation of leads progressing through stages: lead, qualified, proposal, close. Behind him, other entrepreneurs work on their individual pipelines.
scenes.templateHTML: Your Sales Pipeline

scenes.heading: Stage 1: Lead
scenes.narration: Lead: New contact, not yet qualified. Initial outreach within 24 hours.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur reviews a list of new leads on her tablet, prioritizing outreach based on potential fit. She's seated at the communications station, with a countdown timer visible on a nearby screen, reminding her to reach out within 24 hours. Each lead receives a checkmark after the initial outreach.
scenes.templateHTML: Stage 1: Lead

scenes.heading: Stage 2: Qualified
scenes.narration: Qualified: Confirmed fit and interest. Budget, need, and timeline align.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man entrepreneur conducts a virtual meeting, qualifying a prospect. Teal check marks appear next to "Budget," "Need," and "Timeline" on the shared screen. He nods approvingly, confirming alignment with the prospect's requirements.
scenes.templateHTML: Stage 2: Qualified

scenes.heading: Stage 3-4: Proposal to Close
scenes.narration: Proposal sent, then Won or Lost. Each stage has clear exit criteria.
scenes.visualDescription: A Middle Eastern woman entrepreneur analyzes sales data, separating "Won" deals from "Lost" deals with clear criteria. She sorts them by closing dates to help the team learn from the past wins and losses. Teal beams visually separate these categories. She reviews exit criteria to improve the team's strategy.
scenes.templateHTML: Stage 3-4: Proposal to Close

scenes.heading: Follow-Up Systems
scenes.narration: Most entrepreneurs leave money on the table because they're afraid of being annoying.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur cringes while rehearsing a sales call, visibly uncomfortable with being assertive. On his monitor, a message saying “Don’t be afraid to be annoying!” flashes. Other team members give him supportive nods to encourage him to deliver a great pitch.
scenes.templateHTML: Follow-Up Systems

scenes.heading: Silence Is Abandonment
scenes.narration: But silence isn't politeness — it's abandonment.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic woman entrepreneur examines a lead that has gone cold in the pipeline, represented by a dimmed icon on the screen. She sighs, realizing the potential lost opportunity due to lack of follow-up. The station appears dimly lit, emphasizing the feeling of abandonment.
scenes.templateHTML: Silence Is Abandonment

scenes.heading: Build Your System
scenes.narration: Build your system. Trust the numbers. Follow up consistently.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian man entrepreneur confidently reviews a completed sales pipeline flowchart on the large central screen, surrounded by team members. He points to key follow-up points, emphasizing the importance of trusting the system and consistent action. Teal success indicators light up across the communication center.
scenes.templateHTML: Build Your System

scenes.heading: Your Sales Tech Stack
scenes.narration: You've built the strategy and understand the process. Now it's time to add the force multipliers.
scenes.visualDescription: A Middle Eastern man entrepreneur wearing a headset examines a holographic display projecting a layered tech stack diagram. Beams of teal light pulse between the layers, which represent different sales tools. He adjusts a dial on a control panel, seemingly fine-tuning the system. The Communications Station's mission control room stretches behind him, filled with blinking lights and other team members working at their consoles. A large screen displays real-time sales data flowing into the stack.
scenes.templateHTML: Your Sales Tech Stack

scenes.heading: Three Force Multipliers
scenes.narration: Your connector network, your CRM, and AI tools that save hours every week.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur gestures towards three distinct platforms rising from a central control panel. One platform displays a network of interconnected avatars, another has a CRM interface projected above it, and the third shows a stylized AI brain pulsing with light. Teal spotlights shine on each platform, emphasizing their importance. Other team members watch from nearby stations, observing the presentation with interest.
scenes.templateHTML: Three Force Multipliers

scenes.heading: The Power of Connectors
scenes.narration: Connectors are people who bridge you to customers. A single great connector can be worth more than a year of cold outreach.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man entrepreneur stands on a helipad outside the Communications Station, warmly greeting a newly arrived connector. The connector, a Caucasian woman in business attire, steps off a sleek VTOL aircraft marked with a teal stripe. The entrepreneur extends a hand in welcome, a genuine smile on his face. In the background, radio towers transmit signals into the vibrant sunset.
scenes.templateHTML: The Power of Connectors

scenes.heading: Connector Strategy
scenes.narration: Identify them, build relationships first, then make it easy to refer. Give them simple language and tools to share.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic woman entrepreneur sits at a console, using a touchscreen to easily share resources. She's training a group of avatars that represent connectors. One avatar laughs as they see a new way to refer people through an easy-to-use referral program on the screen in front of them. Other entrepreneurs observe and help as they learn the connector strategy.
scenes.templateHTML: Connector Strategy

scenes.heading: CRM: Your Sales Headquarters
scenes.narration: Your CRM is sales headquarters, tracking every prospect, interaction, and next step. Without it, opportunities slip through cracks.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian (East Asian) man entrepreneur sits at the heart of the Communications Station, working intently at a large, curved monitor displaying his CRM dashboard. Teal data streams flow across the screen, illustrating the constant flow of prospect information. One hand hovers over the keyboard, ready to input a key update. He looks frustrated as he notices a sales opportunity has slipped through a crack.
scenes.templateHTML: CRM: Your Sales Headquarters

scenes.heading: CRM Options Compared
scenes.narration: HubSpot is free and full-featured. Pipedrive is sales-focused. Notion offers DIY flexibility. Choose based on your needs.
scenes.visualDescription: A Caucasian man entrepreneur stands before a wall of screens showcasing comparisons of three different CRM options: HubSpot, Pipedrive, and Notion. Each platform's logo is subtly displayed, with key features highlighted in teal. He points to a specific feature on the Pipedrive screen, emphasizing its sales-focused approach. Other entrepreneurs are in the background, working on their laptops.
scenes.templateHTML: CRM Options Compared

scenes.heading: AI for Sales
scenes.narration: AI saves hours: drafting emails, researching prospects, summarizing calls. These tools transform your efficiency.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur leans back in his chair, hands behind his head, a look of relaxed satisfaction on his face. An AI assistant icon hovers beside him, swiftly drafting emails and researching prospects on a holographic display. The Communications Station buzzes with productive activity as other team members use AI tools at their own stations.
scenes.templateHTML: AI for Sales

scenes.heading: AI Warning
scenes.narration: But remember, obviously templated AI outreach hurts more than helps. Always add human touches. People buy from people.
scenes.visualDescription: A Middle Eastern woman entrepreneur looks sternly at a screen displaying a generic, templated AI outreach email. The email is highlighted in red, signaling its lack of personalization. She shakes her head, grabbing a stylus to rewrite the message with a human touch. Radio waves emanate from the Communications Station, symbolizing the potential reach and impact of personalized communication.
scenes.templateHTML: AI Warning

scenes.heading: The Complete System
scenes.narration: Connectors, CRM, and AI aren't replacements for sales skill. They're amplifiers that multiply your effectiveness.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian woman entrepreneur is surrounded by holographic projections of connectors, CRM data streams, and AI-generated insights. She orchestrates these elements with skill, using them to amplify her sales efforts. She's empowered by the tools, but keeps real connections in mind. She smiles as she prepares for a live call with a prospective customer.
scenes.templateHTML: The Complete System

scenes.heading: Build Your Machine
scenes.narration: The best infrastructure is invisible, removing friction so you can focus on what matters: building real relationships with real people.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur works at a minimalistic desk, a single, clean interface displaying only essential information. He focuses intently on a video call with a prospective customer, building a genuine rapport. The background is intentionally blurred, emphasizing the invisible infrastructure that supports his work. The warm glow of the sunset filters through the Communications Station windows.
scenes.templateHTML: Build Your Machine

scenes.heading: The 6-Minute Format
scenes.narration: Your graduation presentation is 6 minutes — enough time to demonstrate your progress without overwhelming your audience.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic woman entrepreneur stands confidently at a podium inside the Summit Pavilion's glass pyramid, a warm spotlight highlighting her determined expression. In front of her, rows of empty chairs await the audience. A timer projected on the glass wall counts down from 6:00. Fireworks are visible through the glass ceiling, ready for launch. She adjusts the microphone, preparing to command the stage.
scenes.templateHTML: The 6-Minute Format

scenes.heading: Every Second Counts
scenes.narration: Every second counts, so let's make them all matter.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur stands on a balcony overlooking the celebration area, eyes narrowed in concentration. He holds a stopwatch and stares intently at the second hand, a determined look etched on his face. The sunset casts long shadows across the pavilion floor below. He's practicing the timing of his pitch, aware that every second matters.
scenes.templateHTML: Every Second Counts

scenes.heading: Presentation Structure
scenes.narration: The format tells a complete story. Minutes 1-2 are your refined elevator pitch.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur sits at a table inside the Summit Pavilion, illuminated by the warm glow of her laptop screen. The screen displays a presentation outline with time allocations for each section of her pitch. She gestures toward the outline with a stylus, refining the flow of her presentation. Champagne flutes are visible on the table, ready for the celebration later.
scenes.templateHTML: Presentation Structure

scenes.heading: Key Learnings
scenes.narration: Minutes 3-4 showcase your key learnings from the program.
scenes.visualDescription: A Middle Eastern man entrepreneur paces thoughtfully in a secluded corner of the Summit Pavilion. He's surrounded by scattered notes, each representing a key learning from the program. He holds two notes in his hand, comparing and contrasting them. Sunlight filters through the pyramid's glass, casting geometric patterns on the floor around him.
scenes.templateHTML: Key Learnings

scenes.heading: Next Steps & Q&A
scenes.narration: Minute 5 outlines your next steps. Minute 6 is reserved for Q&A.
scenes.visualDescription: A White woman entrepreneur stands center stage, radiating confidence as she prepares for the Q&A session. A single spotlight illuminates her, while the background shows blurred figures of potential investors. A question mark hovers subtly above her head, visualized as a teal glow emanating from her thoughts, ready for any inquiry.
scenes.templateHTML: Next Steps & Q&A

scenes.heading: Your Refined Pitch
scenes.narration: Your Week 1 pitch was a starting point. After 6 weeks of discovery, it should be sharper and more specific.
scenes.visualDescription: A South Asian man entrepreneur reviews his week one pitch video on a holographic display inside the Summit Pavilion. The old pitch is visibly rough around the edges. He compares it to a new, polished version on a nearby tablet, highlighting the drastic improvements. He smiles, acknowledging his growth.
scenes.templateHTML: Your Refined Pitch

scenes.heading: Pitch Components
scenes.narration: Your pitch should cover the problem you're solving, your solution, target customer, and competitive advantage — all grounded in real customer insights.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur leans over a holographic projection of her business model, pointing to key components: problem, solution, customer, advantage. Each component is represented by a distinct icon with data points rising and swirling around them. The warm light reflects off her glasses, showcasing her focus on customer insights.
scenes.templateHTML: Pitch Components

scenes.heading: Key Learnings
scenes.narration: The learnings section demonstrates your growth. Choose 2-3 insights that show you've truly learned.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man entrepreneur stands by a whiteboard filled with abstract visual diagrams. The marker creates glowing trails on the whiteboard. The setting sun casts a dramatic shadow, emphasizing the importance of these learnings.
scenes.templateHTML: Key Learnings

scenes.heading: Learning Examples
scenes.narration: Maybe your target customer changed, or your pricing strategy evolved. Show the evolution of your thinking.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic woman entrepreneur is giving a presentation to a small group of judges at the summit pavilion. The holographic projection behind her shows an animated graph that displays an old pricing strategy that is now being replaced with an evolved version that is clearly superior in the updated graph. The judges are leaning in to observe.
scenes.templateHTML: Learning Examples

scenes.heading: Slides: Less is More
scenes.narration: Maximum 5-6 slides. Minimal text. Images over bullet points. One idea per slide.
scenes.visualDescription: An East Asian man entrepreneur meticulously adjusts the layout of a slide deck on his tablet, minimizing the text and replacing bullet points with compelling visuals. A holographic image of a slide projects into the air, showcasing a powerful image of a satisfied customer. He nods in approval at the improved design.
scenes.templateHTML: Slides: Less is More

scenes.heading: Practice First
scenes.narration: Practice without slides first — they support you, not replace you.
scenes.visualDescription: A Middle Eastern woman entrepreneur stands in front of a mirror, practicing her pitch without any slides or notes. She gestures passionately, her words flowing naturally as she connects with her audience in her imagination. The reflection shows confidence and poise, emphasizing her mastery of the material.
scenes.templateHTML: Practice First

scenes.heading: Looking Back, Moving Forward
scenes.narration: Seven weeks ago, you started this journey with an idea.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic woman entrepreneur sits cross-legged on a plush cushion inside the Summit Pavilion, eyes closed in reflection. Around her, faint holographic images flicker, showing glimpses of the Base Camp, Observation Outpost, and other locations from the previous weeks. Sunlight streams through the glass pyramid, illuminating dust motes dancing in the air as she mentally revisits the journey. She holds a worn journal in her lap, a pen resting on the open page.
scenes.templateHTML: Looking Back, Moving Forward

scenes.heading: Your Progress
scenes.narration: Now you have frameworks, validated insights, and a clear path forward.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian man entrepreneur stands at a podium within the Summit Pavilion, presenting his finalized business plan. A holographic projection displays key metrics and user feedback that illustrate his progress. He gestures confidently towards the data. Behind him, other entrepreneurs nod approvingly. Champagne flutes sit on a nearby table, ready for a celebratory toast.
scenes.templateHTML: Your Progress

scenes.heading: Time to Synthesize
scenes.narration: Take a moment to synthesize what you've learned.
scenes.visualDescription: A Middle Eastern woman entrepreneur paces thoughtfully within the Summit Pavilion, surrounded by scattered sticky notes covering the glass walls. She connects the notes with a teal marker, creating a mind map of key learnings. Sunlight glints off the marker as she circles a particularly insightful note.
scenes.templateHTML: Time to Synthesize

scenes.heading: Seven Weeks of Growth
scenes.narration: From foundation to customer discovery, product design to sales strategy.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur examines a holographic timeline projected in the center of the Summit Pavilion. The timeline highlights key milestones from each of the seven weeks, forming a growing visual representation of the course content. He runs his fingers along the timeline, a contemplative expression on his face. Other entrepreneurs are observing from a distance.
scenes.templateHTML: Seven Weeks of Growth

scenes.heading: Building Your Toolkit
scenes.narration: Financial readiness to go-to-market. Each week built on the last.
scenes.visualDescription: A White woman entrepreneur stands before a holographic toolbox that is floating mid-air in the Summit Pavilion. Each tool represents a skill or knowledge area acquired during the program. As she reaches out to touch each tool, it glows teal and displays a key insight. The tool box appears to grow as she interacts with it.
scenes.templateHTML: Building Your Toolkit

scenes.heading: Your Complete Toolkit
scenes.narration: Creating a complete entrepreneurial toolkit.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic man entrepreneur sits at a table in the Summit Pavilion, meticulously organizing color-coded folders and notebooks into a backpack, symbolizing his complete entrepreneurial toolkit. The setting sun casts long shadows across the table, highlighting the variety of resources he has compiled.
scenes.templateHTML: Your Complete Toolkit

scenes.heading: 30-90 Day Action Plan
scenes.narration: Plans without timelines are dreams. Let's build your roadmap.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian woman entrepreneur studies a large holographic calendar, projected against the glass wall of the Summit Pavilion. She uses a stylus to input deadlines and milestones for the next 90 days, creating a detailed action plan. The calendar glows teal as she taps each key date.
scenes.templateHTML: 30-90 Day Action Plan

scenes.heading: Days 1-30: Validate & Build
scenes.narration: Days 1-30 focus on validation and MVP development.
scenes.visualDescription: A White man entrepreneur stands before a 3D model of his MVP (Minimum Viable Product), projected in the center of the Summit Pavilion. He uses hand gestures to manipulate the model, visualizing the validation and initial build phase. The model is glowing with teal highlights, emphasizing the key features.
scenes.templateHTML: Days 1-30: Validate & Build

scenes.heading: Days 31-60: Launch & Iterate
scenes.narration: Days 31-60 on launching and getting feedback.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black woman entrepreneur is reviewing user feedback data on a holographic screen inside the Summit Pavilion. Graphs and charts illustrate the launch performance of her MVP, and she's taking notes in a digital notebook. The data is displayed in teal and orange, highlighting key areas for iteration.
scenes.templateHTML: Days 31-60: Launch & Iterate

scenes.heading: Days 61-90: Scale & Systematize
scenes.narration: Days 61-90 on building scalable systems.
scenes.visualDescription: A Middle Eastern man entrepreneur, sitting at a holographic workstation in the Summit Pavilion, is building a visual diagram of his company's scalable systems. The diagram branches out like a tree, representing different departments and processes. The links between the branches glow teal.
scenes.templateHTML: Days 61-90: Scale & Systematize

scenes.heading: Continuing Resources
scenes.narration: Your learning doesn't stop here. Stay connected through these resources.
scenes.visualDescription: A Hispanic woman entrepreneur is video-calling a mentor displayed as a hologram in the Summit Pavilion. The mentor is giving advice and encouragement. The setting sun casts a warm glow on both of their faces, highlighting the connection and support.
scenes.templateHTML: Continuing Resources

scenes.heading: Support Networks
scenes.narration: The UCF Business Incubation Program, EiE Alumni Network, SCORE mentorship, and Small Business Development Centers.
scenes.visualDescription: An Asian man entrepreneur stands amidst a group of other entrepreneurs in the Summit Pavilion. Each person is holding a holographic card that displays their professional profiles. Networking and exchanging contacts, building the support network for the future.
scenes.templateHTML: Support Networks

scenes.heading: Congratulations, Graduate!
scenes.narration: You came in with an idea. You're leaving with a validated business concept, frameworks for growth, and a community.
scenes.visualDescription: A White woman entrepreneur stands on a podium in the Summit Pavilion, giving a speech. Fireworks are ready to launch outside of the pyramid glass, reflecting the energy of celebration. The entrepreneur raises a champagne glass towards a cheering crowd of fellow graduates.
scenes.templateHTML: Congratulations, Graduate!

scenes.heading: See You at the Summit
scenes.narration: The real work starts now. See you at the summit.
scenes.visualDescription: A Black man entrepreneur stands silhouetted against the sunset outside the Summit Pavilion, gazing towards distant mountain peaks. He clutches a framed certificate, a symbol of his accomplishment. The golden light illuminates his determined expression, ready for the work ahead.
scenes.templateHTML: See You at the Summit
